changeSet.author: jdev
changeSet.sql: create table PLACEMARK ( PLACEMARK_ID int auto_increment primary key, ROUTE_ID INTEGER not null, LONGITUDE DOUBLE, LATITUDE DOUBLE, TIME BIGINT, ROW_TIME TIMESTAMP(26,6) ) ; create table ROUTE ( ROUTE_ID INTEGER default (NEXT VALUE FOR PUBLIC.SYSTEM_SEQUENCE_6349E037_FF6A_4550_8BAF_6285226A30A1) primary key, NAME VARCHAR(32) not null )
